data.name: Alight: Lunar Survival
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST KARAGON: PRELUDE - RELEASING THIS MONTH!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1991020/Karagon_Prelude/


About the Game

Alight is an open world base building survival crafting game.

Stranded in the darkness, survive and build a base scattered across the lunar surface to generate electricity and alight the moon as you upgrade your equipment, struggle for oxygen, and escape fearsome monsters. Alone or together you will survive, gather, craft, build, and explore.

Surviving The Darkness

Survive against fearsome monsters that will come for you in the dark. Hide, run to the light, or attempt to face them head on with your glowsticks.

Exploring The Lunar Surface

Explore many unique biomes across the dark lunar surface, ranging from the rocky lunars to lush luminescent forests. There are 5 unique biomes for you to discover in this open world, but some will be tougher than others, or require special gear to survive!

Craft and construct new gear and vehicles to help you move around faster - lunar boots, hoverboard, and hoverbike!

Generating Electricity

Generate electricity from different sources and use it to power your base, unlock locked treasure, and alight the moon to protect you against the monsters.

As you explore and progress you'll discover new and more powerful energy sources.

Base Building

The outside has no oxygen, so you will have to build a closed base. You will also be able to store your items and fabricate (craft) new items in your base.

Gathering & Crafting

Gather different plants and metals to be able to craft many different items, structures, and gear.

Around the lunar surface you will find locked treasures that will require enough electricity to unlock, and these will unlock new items for you to craft, but be careful - some of these locked treasures will be guarded by the most fearsome of monsters!
